ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Diable 2
ygData.msgSnippet: I got the same problem during stress test.  Just d/l the latest card driver will solve this problem ;)
ygData.messageBody:
I got the same problem during stress test. Just d/l the latest card driver will solve this problem ;)

On Friday, 30 June, 2000 6:38 PM, Dexter Wong [SMTP:dexterw@...] wrote:
> Oh ya anyone has problems running D2 with Direct3D? Im able to run D2 Video
> test with NP and it recommands me the D3D mode, but when I tried to play
> it, D2 hangs my PC when entering the game. Im using the latest Detonator 2
> driver for my Geforce DDR(Detonator 1 driver dont work) and my direct x is
> version 7a and Im running D2 patched(for those who haven patch better go
> download it from Blizzard) version 1.01.
> Currently running D2 in DirectDraw mode(2D only)...
> HELP!!!!
>
